item.title: Rolls-Royce Now Offering Murdered-Out Cars From the Factory
item.description:
Rolls-Royce Now Offering Murdered-Out Cars From the Factory

There's a cynical take on The New York Times and its night-life coverage: If the Grey Lady is reporting on a dank, sexy haunt in Chinatown or a password-only bar hidden behind a West Village townhouse, odds are, the cool kids stopped going years ago.

item.title: The Soul of the Machine
item.description:
The Soul of the Machine

The Morgan EV3 begs the question: How dear the price of progress? My bleating, sputtering, wood-framed Morgan 3-wheeler has a soul. There's no reason anyone should believe a collection of metal, rubber, wood, and plastic is imbued with a spiritual essence, but I do.

item.title: The 2017 Bugatti Chiron Might Break Your Brain
item.description:
The 2017 Bugatti Chiron Might Break Your Brain

Existing superlatives cannot due justice to the insanity that is the 2017 Bugatti Chiron. So rather than try and confer how ridiculous this car is through clever compound adjectives like "fantastimad" or "bonkersanity," we'll let the car's spec sheet speak for itself: The Chiron has 1,480 horsepower and 1,180 pound-feet of torque.

item.title: Koenigsegg announces plans...for a sedan.
item.description:
Koenigsegg announces plans...for a sedan.

Christian von Koenigsegg has his sights locked square on Bugatti. If the Koenigsegg Regera he revealed directly across the hall from the Bugatti Chiron at the Geneva Motor Show isn't proof enough of that, ; his show floor declaration that his company is considering building a sedan certainly is.

item.title: Lamborghini Centenario LP770-4: Ferruccio's Birthday Present
item.description:
Lamborghini Centenario LP770-4: Ferruccio's Birthday Present

So instead, dearly departed Ferruccio-and the world-gets the-760 horsepower, 12-cylinder, mega-exclusive Lamborghini Centenario. It looks almost exactly the way we expected, based on the leaked patent renderings that surfaced last week. Which is to say, it's an orgy of sharp lines and creases jutting out in all kinds of pleasing ways, like the world's most impressive piece of origami.

item.title: Say Hello to Bugatti's $2.6 Million Chiron
item.description:
Say Hello to Bugatti's $2.6 Million Chiron

During WWII, 28-liter turbocharged and supercharged Allison V1710 V-12 engines were manufactured by General Motors and stuffed into North American Aviation P-51 Mustangs and Lockheed P-38 Lightning fighter bombers, where they took the fight to the enemy.

item.title: Koenigsegg's Regera Is the World's Most Endearing Instrument of Chaos
item.description:
Koenigsegg's Regera Is the World's Most Endearing Instrument of Chaos

When Koenigsegg pulled the cover off the Regera concept at last year's Geneva Motor Show, it seemed, well, insane. A 1,500-horsepower hybrid supercar with no conventional transmission? Seriously? Even autocorrect thought it was a bad idea. Try writing "regera" without capitalization. See what it turns into.

item.title: Behind The Scenes in Geneva With the All-New Aston Martin DB11
item.description:
Behind The Scenes in Geneva With the All-New Aston Martin DB11

It's new, it's gorgeous, it's turbo. It's an unbelievable moment. FABRICE COFFRINI/AFP/Getty Images The Aston Martin DB11 has a Quiet Start mode. Press and hold the red button and the V12 comes whirs to life with the exhaust valve closed, muffling its typical full-rev bark.

item.title: Five Things You Could Buy Instead of a Jaguar F-Type SVR
item.description:
Five Things You Could Buy Instead of a Jaguar F-Type SVR

Jaguar officially unwrapped the F-Type SVR coupe and convertible this week, and while we already knew most of the salient details about it thanks to a recent leak,, it's still fun to salivate over the car's specs. A supercharged 5.0-liter V-8 cranked up to 575 horsepower and 516 lb-ft of torque.

item.title: Faster, Nastier, Lightweight Pagani Huayra BC Revealed
item.description:
Faster, Nastier, Lightweight Pagani Huayra BC Revealed

Pagani Automobili has revealed the latest iteration of its Huayra supercar, dubbed Huayra BC, somehow managing to find a new extreme out there on the bleeding edge. Like the standard car, the BC gets a twin-turbocharged V-12 powerplant sourced from AMG, with output climbing to 789 horsepower (an 8 percent bump) and 811 pound-feet of torque.
